articles.author: Franklin Briceño
articles.title: Peru’s Congress removes President Boluarte as a crime wave grips the country - AP News
articles.description: Peru’s Congress voted early Friday to remove deeply unpopular President Dina Boluarte from office as a crime wave grips the South American nation. Lawmakers had set up a debate and impeachment trial late Thursday in the 130-member unicameral Congress after vo…
articles.content: LIMA, Peru (AP) Perus Congress voted early Friday to remove deeply unpopular President Dina Boluarte from office as a crime wave grips the South American nation and quickly replaced her with 38-year-… [+3466 chars]
